title: Perrie Edwards spits swear words as super fan gets huge tattoo of her face on his arm
text:

Perrie Edwards swore when she saw a super fan had got a tattoo of her face on his arm.

Even the Little Mix star did a double take after she took a look at the inking which was an exact replica of one of her photographs.

The pop diva cursed as she saw the likeness between the tattoo and herself.

And clearly a little impressed, she shared the post with her 9.3million Instagram followers.

She wrote: "Holy f***** s**t balls."

Perrie did a collage mock-up showing all angles of her admirer's tattoo which captured her pretty features.

(Image: Instagram)

The Perrie tattoo was framed with a red and yellow glow surrounding it to ensure all eyes were on the detailed inking.

This comes after singer Kelsy Karter had courted attention with a tattoo of Harry Styles' face on her cheek.

Despite all the commotion, the tattoo of the former One Direction star turned out to be a fake.

(Image: perrieedwards/Instagram)

(Image: Getty Images)

Perrie shot to fame as part of the four-piece band Little Mix alongside Jesy Nelson, Jade Thirlwall and Leigh-Anne Pinnock in 2011.

The girls went down in history as they were the first band to ever win The X Factor.

Recently, the foursome squad have been busy putting on a performance for fans with their Little Mix Five tour.

Perrie hasn't gone under the needle for a tattoo, yet bandmates Jesy and Jade both have tattoos.

Her ex Zayn got a tattoo of her name but he had the inking covered when the couple split.
description: Little Mix's Perrie can't believe her eyes as a super fan gets her face as a tattoo sleeve on his arm
